assessment_item.title: CNPJ54 Q22.Following list includes in nitrogen metabolism.  Find out the correct sequence of enzymes with respect to their functions.i) Nitrate reductase ii) Nitrogenaseiii) Nitrite reductase iv) Reductive aminase  v) Transminase

{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Following list includes in nitrogen metabolism.  Find out the correct sequence of enzymes with respect to their functions.

i) Nitrate reductase 

ii) Nitrogenase

iii) Nitrite reductase 

iv) Reductive aminase  

v) Transminase
